name: MPRemoteCommand
desc: An object that responds to remote command events.

items.name: func addTarget(handler: (MPRemoteCommandEvent) -> MPRemoteCommandHandlerStatus) -> Any
items.desc: Adds a block to be called when an event is received.

items.name: func addTarget(Any, action: Selector)
items.desc: Adds a target object to be called when an event is received.

items.name: func removeTarget(Any?)
items.desc: Removes a target from the remote command object.

items.name: func removeTarget(Any, action: Selector?)
items.desc: Removes a target and action from a remote command object.

items.name: enum MPRemoteCommandHandlerStatus
items.desc: Constants indicating the status of a command.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a user can interact with the displayed element.
